original_title: Dem abruptly leaves press call after being informed she is committing felony | Fox News
article_summary: Texas Democratic Rep. Nicole Collier abruptly left a call with California Gov. Gavin Newsom and other Democrats after being told she was committing a felony for participating in the meeting from a state Capitol bathroom, during a debate on a redistricting bill. The call was part of discussions on the Voting Rights Act and the bill's potential impact on black and brown voters.</s>
